verbs.description: Cheers in South Korea and a one - page " extra " edition of a Japanese newspaper [V: have] greeted the unprecedented summit between Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un . Trump became the first sitting American president to meet a North Korean leader Tuesday at a resort hotel in Singapore .
